tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CandidateProfiles (
  candidate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  experience_years INT,
  skills VARCHAR[],
  education VARCHAR[],
  resume_path VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE CandidateProfiles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    skills TEXT[],
    experience_years INT,
    education VARCHAR(100),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Resumes (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT REFERENCES CandidateProfiles (id),
    resume_text TEXT,
    uploaded_date DATE,
    file_path VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE HiringManagers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    department VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE candidate_profiles (candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT, email TEXT, phone_number TEXT, address TEXT)
CREATE TABLE candidate_resumes (resume_id INT PRIMARY KEY, candidate_id INT, resume_text TEXT, skills TEXT[], experience TEXT[], education TEXT[])
CREATE TABLE hiring_managers (manager_id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT, email TEXT, phone_number TEXT, department TEXT)
CREATE TABLE candidate_interviews (interview_id INT PRIMARY KEY, candidate_id INT, manager_id INT, interview_date TIMESTAMP, feedback TEXT)

CREATE TABLE candidates (
    candidate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    resume TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE candidate_skills (
    candidate_id INT,
    skill_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (candidate_id, skill_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidates(candidate_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (skill_id) REFERENCES skills(skill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    company_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidates(candidate_id)
);

CREATE TABLE educations (
    education_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id INT,
    institution_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    degree VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidates(candidate_id)
);
